13 namespace hiro_panda {
14 
15 bool PandaJointPositionController::init(hardware_interface::RobotHW* robot_hardware,
16  ros::NodeHandle& node_handle) {
17  position_joint_interface_ = robot_hardware->get<hardware_interface::PositionJointInterface>();
18 
19  if (position_joint_interface_ == nullptr) {
20  ROS_ERROR(
21  "PandaJointPositionController: Error getting position joint interface from hardware!");
22  return false;
23  }
24 
25  if (!node_handle.getParam("joint_names", joint_names)) {
26  ROS_ERROR("PandaJointPositionController: Could not parse joint names");
27  }
28 
29  if (joint_names.size() != 7) {
30  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointPositionController: Wrong number of joint names, got "
31  << joint_names.size() << " instead of 7 names!");
32  return false;
33  }
34 
35  if (!node_handle.getParam("joint_velocities", joint_velocities)) {
36  ROS_ERROR("PandaJointPositionController: Could not parse joint velocities");
37  }
38 
39  if (joint_velocities.size() != 7) {
40  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointPositionController: Wrong number of joint velocities, got "
41  << joint_velocities.size() << " instead of 7!");
42  return false;
43  }
44 
45  position_joint_handles_.resize(7);
46  commanded_joint_positions.resize(7);
47  for (size_t i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
48  try {
49  position_joint_handles_[i] = position_joint_interface_->getHandle(joint_names[i]);
50  } catch (const hardware_interface::HardwareInterfaceException& e) {
51  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(
52  "PandaJointPositionController: Exception getting joint handles: " << e.what());
53  return false;
54  }
55  }
56 
57  // Get URDF info about joint
58  if (!urdf_model.initParamWithNodeHandle("robot_description", node_handle)) {
59  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse urdf file");
60  return false;
61  }
62 
63  bool passed = checkJointVelocityLimits(joint_velocities);
64 
65  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
66  commanded_joint_positions[i] = position_joint_handles_[i].getPosition();
67  }
68 
69  sub_command_ = node_handle.subscribe<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>("command", 10, &PandaJointPositionController::jointCommandCb, this);
70 
71 
72  std::string arm_id;
73  if (!node_handle.getParam("arm_id", arm_id)) {
74  ROS_ERROR("PandaJointPositionController: Could not read parameter arm_id");
75  return false;
76  }
77  auto* state_interface = robot_hardware->get<franka_hw::FrankaStateInterface>();
78  if (state_interface == nullptr) {
79  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointPositionController: Error getting state interface from hardware");
80  return false;
81  }
82 
83  try {
84  state_handle_ = std::make_unique<franka_hw::FrankaStateHandle>(
85  state_interface->getHandle(arm_id + "_robot"));
86  } catch (hardware_interface::HardwareInterfaceException& ex) {
87  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(
88  "PandaJointPositionController: Exception getting state handle from interface: " << ex.what());
89  return false;
90  }
91 
92  return true;
93 }
94 
95 void PandaJointPositionController::starting(const ros::Time& /* time */) {
96  count = 0;
97 }
98 
99 void PandaJointPositionController::update(const ros::Time& /*time*/,
100  const ros::Duration& period) {
101  // Get current Franka::RobotState
102  franka::RobotState robot_state = state_handle_->getRobotState();
103 
104  // Compute the postition errors
105  std::array<double, 7> position_diff{};
106  std::array<int, 7> sign{0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
107  std::array<double, 7> new_velocity{};
108 
109 
110  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
111  position_diff[i] = commanded_joint_positions[i] - position_joint_handles_[i].getPosition();
112 
113  // if ((count % 1000 == 0) && (joint_names[i] == "panda_joint1"))
114  // {
115  // ROS_INFO_STREAM(commanded_joint_positions[i] << " " << position_joint_handles_[i].getPosition());
116  // }
117 
118  if (position_diff[i] < 0)
119  {
120  sign[i] = -1;
121  } else if (position_diff[i] > 0) {
122  sign[i] = 1;
123  }
124 
125  double gain = 1 / (1 + (0.2 * pow(abs(position_diff[i]), -1)));
126  new_velocity[i] = sign[i] * gain * joint_velocities[i];
127 
128  double delta_angle = new_velocity[i] * period.toSec();
129  double next_position = position_joint_handles_[i].getPosition() + delta_angle;
130  position_joint_handles_[i].setCommand(next_position);
131 
132  // if ((count % 1000 == 0) && (joint_names[i] == "panda_joint1"))
133  // {
134  // ROS_INFO_STREAM(joint_names[i] << " " << position_diff[i] << " " << gain << " " << delta_angle << " " << position_joint_handles_[i].getPosition() << " " << robot_state.q[i] << " " << next_position);
135  // }
136  }
137 
138  count += 1;
139 }
140 
141 void PandaJointPositionController::jointCommandCb(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr& joint_position_commands) {
142  if (joint_position_commands->data.size() != 7) {
143  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointPositionController: Wrong number of joint position commands, got "
144  << joint_position_commands->data.size() << " instead of 7 commands!");
145  }
146 
147  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
148  commanded_joint_positions[i] = joint_position_commands->data[i];
149  ROS_INFO_STREAM("PandaJointPositionController::jointCommandCb::Joint " << i << " " << commanded_joint_positions[i]);
150  }
151 }
152 
153 bool PandaJointPositionController::checkJointVelocityLimits(std::vector<double>& joint_velocities) {
154  for (int i=0; i < joint_names.size(); i++) {
155  urdf::JointConstSharedPtr joint_urdf_ = urdf_model.getJoint(joint_names[i]);
156  if (!joint_urdf_) {
157  ROS_ERROR("Could not find joint '%s' in urdf", joint_names[i].c_str());
158  return false;
159  }
160 
161  // Check that this joint has applicable limits
162  if (joint_urdf_->type == urdf::Joint::REVOLUTE || joint_urdf_->type == urdf::Joint::PRISMATIC) {
163  if (joint_velocities[i] > joint_urdf_->limits->velocity) { // above upper limnit
164  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Given Joint Velocity is higher than the upper limit: " << joint_urdf_->limits->velocity);
165  return false;
166  } else if (joint_velocities[i] < -joint_urdf_->limits->velocity) { // below lower limit
167  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Given Joint Velocity is lower than the lower limit: " << -joint_urdf_->limits->velocity);
168  return false;
169  }
170  }
171  }
172 
173  return true;
174 }
175 
176 } // namespace hiro_panda
